data.quote: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: We can't solve problems by using the same kind of thinking we used when we created them.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: The only source of knowledge is experience.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
data.author: Albert Einstein
